
#::(?X, ?Y, ?B)

   The constraint X #::  Y has the truth value B. The predicate is an alias for ::/3.



Arguments
   ?X                  A domain variable
   ?Y                  A linear term.
   ?B                  A variable with domain 0..1.

Type
   library(fd)

Resatisfiable
      No.

Fail Conditions
      Fails if B is not the truth value of the associated constraint.



See Also
   :: / 3, #>= / 3, #< / 3, #<= / 3, #= / 3, #\= / 3
